resources.string:
Wayne Enterprises, Inc, also known as WayneCorp, is a fictional company appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics, commonly in association with the superhero Batman.
The American diversified multinational conglomerate is owned and chaired by Bruce Wayne, who is also Batman. Wayne Enterprises is a green company based out of the fictional city of Gotham City and headquartered in a building called Wayne Tower.[1]
Wayne Enterprises and the Wayne Foundation are largely run by Bruce Wayne business manager Lucius Fox. Fox makes most company decisions on Bruce Waynes behalf, since Wayne time is largely occupied as the vigilante Batman.
